promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a massive special gorilla electric-type wearing ornate bracers. It can be found in city-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or electric. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Braceror, a massive special gorilla electric-type pokemon. It can be found in city-like environments It has the following abilities: thunder-punch, explosion. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word gorilla or electric or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, gorilla-like, special, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, lightning background
generatedDescription: Braceror towers over cities, wreaking havoc with thunder-punch and explosions. Its wrathful presence is feared yet respected.
